00018 
00019 namespace DdMd
00020 {
00021 
00022    using namespace Util;
00023 
00024    /*
00025    * Constructor.
00026    */
00027    OutputPairEnergies::OutputPairEnergies(Simulation& simulation) 
00028     : Diagnostic(simulation),
00029       nSample_(0),
00030       isInitialized_(false)
00031    {}
00032 
00033    /*
00034    * Read interval and outputFileName. 
00035    */
00036    void OutputPairEnergies::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00037    {
00038       readInterval(in);
00039       readOutputFileName(in);
00040       isInitialized_ = true;
00041    }
00042 
00043    /*
00044    * Open output file. 
00045    */
00046    void OutputPairEnergies::setup() 
00047    {  
00048        nSample_ = 0; 
00049        std::string filename;
00050        filename  = outputFileName();
00051        simulation().fileMaster().openOutputFile(filename, outputFile_);
00052    }
00053 
00054    /*
00055    * Compute and output pair energies at regular intervals.
00056    */
00057    void OutputPairEnergies::sample(long iStep) 
00058    {
00059       if (isAtInterval(iStep))  {
00060          Simulation& sys = simulation();
00061          sys.computePairEnergies();
00062          if (sys.domain().isMaster()) {
00063             DMatrix<double> pair = sys.pairEnergies();
00064             outputFile_ << Int(iStep, 10);
00065             for (int i = 0; i < simulation().nAtomType(); ++i){
00066                for (int j = 0; j < simulation().nAtomType(); ++j){
00067                   outputFile_ << Dbl(pair(i,j), 20);
00068                }
00069             }
00070             outputFile_  << std::endl;
00071          }
00072 
00073          ++nSample_;
00074       }
00075    }
00076 
00077 }
00078 #endif
